events.name: Kojobs Seminar
events.text: Kojobs held event to help students be connected to UW Alumni currently working in various industries.

events.name: Kochinso
events.text: Kojobs held event that helped current non-major students to be connected to peers who are currently majoring in the various majors.

events.name: Konnect
events.text: Kojobs held event that helped current non-major students to be connected to peers who are currently majoring in the various majors.

events.name: Kojobs Game Night
events.text: Kojobs held Kojobs Night event to help students and members of Kojobs to make some connections, as well as promoting them to obtain friendships.

events.name: General Meeting
events.text: Kojobs held General Meeting event to provide brief introduction of KOJOBS, what purpose it has, and introduced members of the organization.
